item.title: Democrats Love Censorship Because They Know They’d Lose Without It
item.description: President Joe Biden scolded Big Tech for doing away with 'fact-checkers,' a reminder that Democrats need censorship to stay in power.

item.title: Petitions Ask Trump To Pardon The Pro-Lifers He Promised To Get Out Of The Biden ‘Gulags’
item.description: Trump has pledged to help the people targeted by President Joe Biden’s partisan DOJ on day one of his second term.

item.title: Judge In CNN Defamation Case Orders Outlet’s Lead Counsel To Apologize To U.S. Navy Vet
item.description: CNN’s lead counsel was forced to apologize to U.S. Navy veteran Zachary Young on Thursday morning for repeatedly calling him a liar during the defamat...

item.title: Indiana, West Virginia Governors Sign Orders Prohibiting DEI Across Government Agencies
item.description: Indiana and West Virginia's new GOP governors signed executive orders on Tuesday effectively prohibiting DEI in their respective governments.

item.title: These Servicemembers Punished For Refusing The Covid Jab Are Counting On Hegseth To Make Things Right
item.description: The Covid mandate put thousands in the impossible position of weighing values against their military career; only one could remain intact.
